404.message: The page you were looking for does not exist.
404.title: Page not found

info.description: To make it easier and faster for you to reach your store, your chosen pick-up location will be saved and automatically selected the next time you visit this website.
info.title: Choose your preferred pick-up location

redirecting.description: You will be redirected to the new page in a few seconds. Click cancel or press Esc to choose another pick-up location
redirecting.title: Redirecting...

box.p1: In order to shop at this hub, NeNaNa must register you as a customer. <2>Only customers who registered using this form can make purchases on OpenFoodNetwork</2>. To do so, fill out the form below and submit it.
box.p2: After submitting the form, NeNaNa will manually add you to your hub. <2>Please note that you will not be able to make purchases until this has been done</2>. Once you have been added as a customer, you will receive a welcome email from NeNaNa. This email contains all the information you need to proceed, as well as information you will need for shopping (information about OFN, access to the depot, order cycle procedures, etc.).
box.title: Registration instructions

description.communication: NeNanA can send you reminders so you don't miss your weekly order cycle, as well as information about events and special offers. You can choose none, one or both.
description.email: The email address we should use to contact you
description.name: Your first and last name

label.communication: Would you like to receive notifications from NeNaNa?
label.name: Name
label.termsAccepted: I accept the terms of use: By submitting this form, I agree that NeNaNa may contact me to welcome me and provide me with information on how to proceed (registration on the OpenFoodNetwork platform, access to the repository, etc.).

register.title: NeNaNa Box / OpenFoodNetwork Hub Account Registration

registerStart.p1: Registration is required in order to access the NeNaNa OpenFoodNetwork Hub. If you already have an account and received instructions from one of our hub managers (maybe you are using this app on a new device?), you can continue without another registration process and wait to be redirected to your selected hub.
registerStart.title: Already have an account?

box.p1: You have already registered with NeNaNa. Please check your email for instructions on how to complete your registration. Please do not register again, instead, if you think something went wrong, contact the hub's manager.
box.title: Registration already sent

box.button: Go back to the home page
box.p1: Thank you for registering with NeNaNa. Please check your email for instructions on how to proceed. You will hear from us within 2-3 business days.

home.description: Choose a store to be forwarded to the next time you visit this site
home.title: NeNaNa

register.description: Register for a NeNaNa account to access an OFN store directly via this website.
register.title: NeNaNa - Registration

storeMap.noStores: No stores found to display on map

storeSelection.error: There was an error loading the store data
